price: 3. Degenen die perfect hun gebeden verrichten en Zakat geven en die met zekerheid in het hiernamaals geloven.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūna
